org.lenskit.util

Class DynamicVariable<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lenskit.util.DynamicVariable<T>

  • public class DynamicVariable<T>
extends java.lang.Object

    A dynamic variable, manging scoped changes of value. These values are not thread-local.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DynamicVariable.Scope
      Class encapsulating a dynamic variable scope.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DynamicVariable() 
      DynamicVariable(T init)
      Create a dynamic variable with an initial value.

      Get the current value of this dynamic variable.

      • DynamicVariable

        Create a dynamic variable with an initial value.

    • Method Detail

      • assign

        public DynamicVariable.Scope assign(T val)

        Assign a new value to this dynamic variable.

        Parameters:
        val - The value to assign.
        Returns:
        The scope of the assignment; closing the scope undoes the assignment.

      • get

        public T get()

        Get the current value of this dynamic variable.

        Returns:
        The current value in the variable.
